title: Potential Phishing scam??
body:
I am pretty certain it is, but someone i have added sent me a link on discord related to rewards one could claim due to the worlds championship 2017 being on.

It basically said with the link "Claim exclusive RP rewards - 2017 World Championship" 

Now i haven't clicked the link nor do i plan on sharing it on the forums as that could right royally destroy me. The person who sent it to me stated that the "rewards" was a League EU thing and that you could claim them on OCE too.

Now i did some digging on forums and whatnot and have not found anything in relation to there being rewards.

Anyone got some info or ideas for me?

replies.body:
That one, although no legit, but it seemed to do no harm... 

all it asks its your summoner name and region which is public information anyway (if you randomly do a search on op.gg)

I dont think it does anything, no purpose, almost setup for trolling

It is a scam, and it seems to be tricking quite a few people. 

>Any promotions or events ran will be announced and confirmed by Riot and will be hosted on one of the following domains:

>www.riotgames.com
www.leagueoflegends.com
www.lolesports.com

Assuming you are referring to the link that everybody everywhere keeps spamming, you can tell its fake since it doesn't have the correct domain. 
Best not to click it and to warn your friends about it and make it known to the people that moderate the discords you are apart of that it is not a legit website and may be unsafe.

[You can read more about scams/securing your account here](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/8GVrAi62-security-reminder-beware-of-scamsphishing-sites).

Ok thanks, reason why i was unsure is that a couple of my trusted IRL friends said that they've clicked the link and had no issues.

but will do, i'll make sure to let everyone know

I'm not exactly sure what it does, but considering it is trying very hard to pass as a Riot website (and the fact we know that it isn't), probably means its not harmless.

Remind your friends to change their passwords asap :)
GL
